ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] greetings and a ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Although I am not familiar with the Pali quests this similar thing happened to me with my Hafling rogue. First, if you are SURE the elements are exactly what
ygData.messageBody:
Although I am not familiar with the Pali quests this
similar thing happened to me with my Hafling rogue.


First, if you are SURE the elements are exactly what
you need, then you may indeed have the wrong forge. In
rivervale there are two different ones. Look on
eq.atlas.com to see how many are in that city.

Second, the information you are getting is telling you
that it can't combine which could be the wrong items.
Make sure they are exactlt the ones you need and if
you require 2 stones let say, DON"T STACK them.
Meaning don't put the stacked 2 in the slot, put one
in at a time in 2 different slots.

Let us know how you make it, I am sure you will get it
right

Rob
--- "(Ralph) Clay" <wolffmanus@...> wrote:
> Well EQ got me hooked.
> I started playing about 2 months ago and am
> really enjoying
> myself. But I am stuck. I use the diff. infomation
> and maps you can
> find on the net as well as equipment list ect to
> help me find things
> for quests ect. well I am stumped...
>
> I am working on a High Elf Pally and am really
> enjoying building this
> guy up. I started working on the Felwithe Defenders
> Falchion quest.
> I am 8th level and the quest is rated 10th to 15th
> level.I started
> the quest (talking to the Seria elf in the pally
> house) I killed the
> masked spy and the Gen. Orc (with the help of a
> Dwarf with a Big
> hammer.) (Note: the Spy and the Gen. Orc can be
> found talking
> together at -2096.28, 2326.77 in Greater
> Faydark)and they can be
> pulled with spells one at a time) I got their heads
> and turned them
> in to Seria and got the dull sword I'm to sharpen
> the sword, and turn
> it in with some arborean amber and a P.forest
> drakeling scale to get
> the first pally sword....well the dum sword will not
> sharpen, I use 1
> and 2 sharping stones, the sword and put them in the
> forge in the
> armorer's shop and I'm told "these idems will not
> combine try another
> forge...WHAT other forge?? My first ? is..is there
> another forge in
> the high elf city and if so where or is it because I
> am only 8th
> level?
>
> my 2nd ? is on the first Pally armor quest where or
> what in the name
> of all the good gods can I find or what is "Brick of
> crude Bronze"
> and where can I find/make them (I need 2 for my
> first peace of armor)
>
> Thanks
>
> Slicesi
> High Elf Pally
> No Guild
>
>
>
